body:
**tambola**
=======

This is a online tambola playing web application. 

Presently many users can play the same game but the notification of winner is not done

> It is written to teach the basics of google appengine to students.

This project implements following from **google app engine** and **objectify library**

  * The folder structure of publishing apps on google app engine in Java.
  * How to save and retrieve data from the google datastore using the _objectify library_
  
For the frontend of the application I have used a very good responsive framework by [Zurb](http://zurb.com) known as [Foundation](http://foundation.zurb.com)

There are very good technologies. This project uses the least use of that but in the end 
> It's just to light the fire inside you

[Ashutosh Singh](http://facebook.com/t0m.ashu)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Tambola
